Text: Cheers mate. ;) I was surprised I managed to get it myself! lol. But I read it and it was talking about the recent Belgian Grand Prix, so yeah
Much appreciated! This is a true PDF, by the way, not the horrible bitmap PDF that is also doing the rounds (which is about 52 MB).

Hey thorhammer - not sure what you mean; do you mean that the other one is an image of each page? Mine is real text in each page; i.e. you can highlight text etc.

Funny; I used to download these items from your uploads! ;)
Sorry guys; Autosport 8 Sept will be coming; but I'm having some difficulties getting it so won't be on for a few more hours.
